title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs with parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta, mix quickly with pancetta and remove from heat.
Add egg mixture and stir fast so it doesn’t scramble.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onion and garlic, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add cream and cooked chicken pieces.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then serve with rice or naan.
